Intro.heading: Hi, I'm Theo. A creative frontend developer passionate about UX, clean code, and design.
Intro.description:
I've been working as a frontend developer since 2016, focusing on clean frontend architectures, precise testing, and agile collaboration in interdisciplinary, cross-functional teams.

My focus: modernizing processes, developing user-centered web applications, and approaching tasks with structure and a solution-oriented mindset.
Intro.photoAlt: A photo of me sitting on a mountain in Norway

Projects.heading: Projects
Projects.description: A small selection of my favorite projects on which I contributed.

project1.projectTitle: Modernization and enhancement of warehouse management for a renowned online retailer
project1.customerType: for a europe-wide operating online retailer
project1.responsibilitiesTaken_1: Managed project communication in English to ensure seamless international collaboration
project1.responsibilitiesTaken_2: Conducted pair programming and code reviews to share knowledge
project1.responsibilitiesTaken_3: Developed browser-based features for barcode scanners to enable efficient data capture
project1.responsibilitiesTaken_4: Collaborated with logistics and backend teams to optimize interfaces and processes
project1.result: The project successfully digitized the picking process for approximately 25,000 daily item sales, significantly improving accuracy. A key feature was a browser-based solution for barcode scanners, enabling efficient and error-free data capture. Optimized interfaces ensured accessibility for employees with visual impairments or illiteracy, boosting productivity. External staff received training in modern frontend technologies like React, enabling them to independently continue development after handover.

project2.projectTitle: Development of a new platform for recruitment in the healthcare sector
project2.responsibilitiesTaken_1: Development of a scalable frontend architecture based on modern best practices
project2.responsibilitiesTaken_2: Rapid delivery of a functional MVP for early user testing and feedback
project2.responsibilitiesTaken_3: Regular collaboration with stakeholders to refine project requirements
project2.responsibilitiesTaken_4: Implementation of real-time monitoring with Sentry to improve system stability and performance

project3.projectTitle: Development of a new online shop for streetwear
project3.customerType: for a German, locally based e-commerce company
project3.responsibilitiesTaken_1: Utilized a static site generator with SEO optimizations to create a high-performance and fast online shop platform
project3.responsibilitiesTaken_2: Implemented an easy-to-use content management system for flexible management and customization of shop modules
project3.responsibilitiesTaken_3: Ensured seamless integration and communication between the Shopify system and the web frontend solution in Gatsby using GraphQL and Netlify
project3.responsibilitiesTaken_4: Established and maintained a robust continuous integration/continuous deployment pipeline to support regular and reliable shop updates

project4.projectTitle: Development of a user interface for distributed learning using AI
project4.customerType: for a scientific institute (IT forensics and media security)
project4.responsibilitiesTaken_1: Redesigned and implemented a web application in React with Vite, tailored for scientists to train models
project4.responsibilitiesTaken_2: Actively participated in an agile, cross-functional team with bi-weekly sprints to enhance transparency, flexibility, and team efficiency
project4.responsibilitiesTaken_3: Designed, developed, and tested components using TypeScript, Vitest, and Vite
project4.responsibilitiesTaken_4: Regularly planned and conducted sprint reviews to present progress and align with stakeholders

project5.projectTitle: Development and redesign of an online presence
project5.responsibilitiesTaken_1: Oversaw design and frontend implementation to deliver a user-friendly, high-performance web solution
project5.responsibilitiesTaken_2: Created designs and mock-ups tailored to stakeholder requirements and target audience needs
project5.responsibilitiesTaken_3: Executed SEO strategies and Google Ads campaigns to improve visibility and lead generation
project5.responsibilitiesTaken_4: Developed a performant, cost-efficient, and maintainable web solution to meet long-term business needs

project6.projectTitle: Development of a browser-based ebook reader for desktop, tablet, and mobile
project6.customerType: for an IT service provider in the media industry
project6.responsibilitiesTaken_1: Developed frontend features using Clean Code and Clean Architecture principles with Angular
project6.responsibilitiesTaken_2: Managed deployments and release cycles with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)
project6.responsibilitiesTaken_3: Designed the UX/UI for the web application and landing page
project6.responsibilitiesTaken_4: Planned and conducted user experience and usability tests

project7.projectTitle: Service for marking images with invisible watermarks
project7.customerType: for an IT service provider in the media security sector
project7.responsibilitiesTaken_1: Performed requirements analysis and created user stories
project7.responsibilitiesTaken_2: Developed features using Clean Code and Clean Architecture principles with VueJS
project7.responsibilitiesTaken_3: Actively participated in an agile, cross-functional team with bi-weekly sprints to enhance transparency, flexibility, and team efficiency
project7.responsibilitiesTaken_4: Planned and conducted user experience and usability tests

Skills.heading: Skills
Skills.skill_1: Developing scalable and future-proof frontend architectures
Skills.skill_2: Creating user journeys, wireframes, prototypes, and MVPs
Skills.skill_4: Requirement analysis as well as prioritizing, estimating, and writing user stories
Skills.skill_5: Collaboration in interdisciplinary teams using Scrum
Skills.skill_6: Conducting target audience analyses and usability testing
Skills.skill_7: Implementing monitoring solutions in the frontend
Skills.skill_10: Designing and pixel-perfect implementation of mock-ups
Skills.skill_11: Expertise in state-of-the-art best practices in frontend development
Skills.skill_14: Unit Tests, E2E testing, Integration Tests

Other.heading: Talks & Workshops
Other.description: Sharing knowledge and inspiring others is my passion. If I find enough time, I enjoy giving workshops in small groups or write on topics that spark my curiosity, from cutting-edge technologies to innovative approaches in development and design. Whether it's about building better solutions or fostering collaboration, I'm always eager to connect, exchange ideas, and learn together.
Other.workshop_1_description: Internal 2023 analysis of new and established frameworks and their technical characteristics
Other.workshop_8_title: Frontend Architecture Design & Introduction to React
Other.workshop_8_description: A one-hour workshop especially for backend developers to introduce them to modern frontend architectures built with React
Other.workshop_2_description: Internal two-hour mini-workshop for developers on design principles and the basics of UI and UX design
Other.workshop_3_title: 10 Great Reasons to Use Gatsby in Your Next Project
Other.workshop_3_description: Blog post highlighting 10 advantages of using Gatsby as a static site generator
Other.workshop_4_title: Improving Any UI with 10 Usability Heuristics
Other.workshop_4_description: Blog post discussing 10 time-tested UI heuristics that have been relevant for over 30 years and are still applicable today
Other.workshop_5_title: Recruiting 4.0 â€“ How We Created an Intuitive User Experience for Applicants
Other.workshop_5_description: Blog post about recruiting and redesigning job pages. Our results were also recognized in Henner Knabenreich's book on recruiting.
Other.workshop_6_title: For More Diversity in Development Teams
Other.workshop_6_description: Column in Java Magazine about the benefits of increased diversity in development teams
Other.workshop_7_description: Talk on UX design and frontend development using redesigned job pages as an example

FunFacts.heading: Fun Facts
FunFacts.funFact_1: I love animals, especially dwarf hamsters.
FunFacts.funFact_2: For three months, I went to a japanese middle school in 2009.
FunFacts.funFact_3: I enjoy practicing yoga since 2013 in my free time.
FunFacts.funFact_5: I like to paint landscapes with watercolors.
FunFacts.funFact_6: I was 13 years old when I built my first website.
